title: Prem Bistro and Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Vietnamese
description: Plenty of vegan options (scrambled tofu, soups, salads, chickpea burger, quinoa stir fry, wraps, Asian tofu and vegetable dishes). Every day there is a set lunch menu which includes soup and main course. Open air terrace seating. Wi-fi.
